name: RaspiRoverDuino
body: RaspiRoverDuino ============ Integration Dagu 5 Rover 4x4 with Arduino and Raspberry PI via Node.js Hardware -------------- - Dagu Rover 5 Tracked Chassis with Encoders - Dagu - 4 Channel DC Motor Controller with Encoder Support - Expansion Plate - RaspBerry PI Model B - WiFi Dongle - Tenda W311U+ High Gain 3.5dB - RaspiCam - Pan Tilt Cam - Arduino UNO R3 - 9 Volt Battery for Dagu - 4 Channel DC Motor Controller - CallPod - Fueltank UNO for Raspberry PI - Snap Clip 9V Battery - Jumper Cable App Configuration -------------- SW Configuration -------------- - WIFI configuration - Node.js - Raspi Camera - RaspiCam Stream TO DO HW Configuration -------------- Arduino - Channel 13 - Tilt Pan Left-Right - Channel 12 - Tilt Pan Upper-Down Expansion Plate - Cut expansion plate with two holes under the engine controller to pass the 4 motor connectors TO DO ADD IMAGE TO DO Images -------------- Video -------------- First Test TO DO -------------- - Raspicam Tilt pannel hardware and software config - Extressjs and nodejs integration express.io - test on mobile phone - change raspberry to hotspot wifi.
